CustomField.description: Is checked if the Giving Summary is outdated based on the last time it was updated
CustomField.formula: OR( OR( AND( ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Giving_Summary_Last_Updated__c), ucinn_ascendv2__Session__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Is_Ready_for_G_L__c), AND( ucinn_ascendv2__Session__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Is_Ready_for_G_L__c, ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Giving_Summary_Last_Updated__c < ucinn_ascendv2__Session__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Session_Completed__c)), OR( AND( ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Account__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Giving_Summary_Last_Updated__c), ucinn_ascendv2__Session__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Is_Ready_for_G_L__c), AND( ucinn_ascendv2__Session__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Is_Ready_for_G_L__c, ucinn_ascendv2__Account__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Giving_Summary_Last_Updated__c < ucinn_ascendv2__Session__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Session_Completed__c)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is checked if the Giving Summary is outdated based on the last time it was updated
CustomField.label: Is Giving Summary Outdated
